verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> Now after this כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> this וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> it came to pass that David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיַּכְנִיעֵ֑ם <S%H3665><s%> and subdued וַיִּקַּ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> them and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גַּ֥ת <S%H1661><s%> Gath וּבְנֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> And he smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab וַיִּהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> became מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> and the Moabites עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> servants לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> became David's נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> [and] brought מִנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> gifts

וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> smote דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <S%H1909><s%> Hadadezer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king צוֹבָ֖ה <S%H6678><s%> of Zobah חֲמָ֑תָה <S%H2574><s%> unto Hamath בְּלֶכְתּ֕וֹ <S%H1980><s%> went לְהַצִּ֥יב <S%H5324><s%> to stablish יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his dominion בִּֽנְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river פְּרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates

וַיִּלְכֹּד֩ <S%H3920><s%> took דָּוִ֨יד <S%H1732><s%> And David מִמֶּ֜נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> from him a thousand רֶ֗כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וְשִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand פָּֽרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he רַגְלִ֑י <S%H7273><s%> foot soldier וַיְעַקֵּ֤ר <S%H6131><s%> also houghed דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> all the chariot וַיּוֹתֵ֥ר <S%H3498><s%> [horses] but reserved מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> of them an hundred רָֽכֶב׃ <S%H7393><s%> chariots

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> came אֲרַ֣ם <S%H758><s%> And when the Syrians דַּרְמֶ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus לַעְז֕וֹר <S%H5826><s%> to help לַהֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <S%H1909><s%> Hadadezer מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king צוֹבָ֑ה <S%H6678><s%> of Zobah וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> slew דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David בַּאֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Then David בַּאֲרַ֣ם <S%H758><s%> and the Syrians דַּרְמֶ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> became אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> and the Arameans לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> became David's עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> servants נֹשְׂאֵ֣י <S%H5375><s%> [and] brought מִנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> gifts וַיּ֤וֹשַׁע <S%H3467><s%> preserved יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Thus the LORD לְדָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> whithersoever he went

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took דָּוִ֗יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> שִׁלְטֵ֣י <S%H7982><s%> the shields הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> were carried עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> that were on the servants הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and brought יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> them to Jerusalem

וּמִטִּבְחַ֤ת <S%H2880><s%> Likewise from Tibhath וּמִכּוּן֙ <S%H3560><s%> and from Chun עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities הֲדַדְעֶ֔זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> brought דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> David נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brass רַבָּ֣ה <S%H7227><s%> much מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> very בָּ֣הּ ׀ עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> made שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> wherewith Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָ֤ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> the brasen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽעַמּוּדִ֔ים <S%H5982><s%> and the pillars וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> and the vessels הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> of brass פ

וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> heard תֹּ֖עוּ <S%H8583><s%> Now when Tou מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> had smitten דָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> how David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֵ֖יל <S%H2426><s%> army הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king צוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H6678><s%> of Zobah

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדֽוֹרָם־ <S%H1913><s%> Hadoram בְּנ֣וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> to king דָּ֠וִיד <S%H1732><s%> David [לִשְׁאֹול־ כ] (לִשְׁאָל־ <S%H7592><s%> to enquire ל֨וֹ <S%H7592><s%> to enquire ק) לְשָׁל֜וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of his welfare וּֽלְבָרֲכ֗וֹ <S%H1288><s%> and to congratulate עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he נִלְחַ֤ם <S%H3898><s%> him because he had fought בַּהֲדַדְעֶ֙זֶר֙ <S%H1909><s%> Hadadezer וַיַּכֵּ֔הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and smitten כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> at מִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <S%H4421><s%> war תֹּ֖עוּ <S%H8583><s%> Tou הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> had הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <S%H1909><s%> Hadadezer וְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֛י <S%H3627><s%> of articles זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> and brass

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> הִקְדִּ֞ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> dedicated הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Them also king דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> with the silver וְהַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> and the gold אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> that he brought מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> from all [these] nations מֵֽאֱד֤וֹם <S%H123><s%> from Edom וּמִמּוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> and from Moab וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and from the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וּמִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> and from the Philistines וּמֵֽעֲמָלֵֽק׃ <S%H6002><s%> and from Amalek

וְאַבְשַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> Moreover Abishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> of the Edomites בְּגֵ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> in the valley הַמֶּ֔לַח <S%H4417><s%> of salt שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put בֶּֽאֱדוֹם֙ <S%H123><s%> in Edom נְצִיבִ֔ים <S%H5333><s%> garrisons וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> became כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֱד֖וֹם <S%H123><s%> and all the Edomites עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> servants לְדָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> became David's וַיּ֤וֹשַׁע <S%H3467><s%> preserved יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Thus the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> whithersoever he went

וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> So David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> over all Israel וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become עֹשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> and executed מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and justice לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> among all his people

וְיוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> [was] over the host וִיהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> and Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <S%H286><s%> of Ahilud מַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> recorder

וְצָד֧וֹק <S%H6659><s%> And Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיט֛וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub וַאֲבִימֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H40><s%> and Abimelech בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶבְיָתָ֖ר <S%H54><s%> of Abiathar כֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> [were] the priests וְשַׁוְשָׁ֖א <S%H7798><s%> and Shavsha סוֹפֵֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> was scribe

וּבְנָיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1141><s%> And Benaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַכְּרֵתִ֖י <S%H3774><s%> [was] over the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֑י <S%H6432><s%> and the Pelethites וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons דָוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> of David הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> [were] chief לְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king פ
